org.grails.plugin.gspresources
[Groovy] Class GspResourceMeta

java.lang.Object
  org.grails.plugin.resource.ResourceMeta
      org.grails.plugin.gspresources.GspResourceMeta

class GspResourceMeta
extends ResourceMeta

Synthetic resource that compiles a GSP to a target file.

Authors:
Stefan Kendell
Francis McKenzie

Property Summary
Resource gsp

The original GSP resource on the file system
ResourceModule gspModule

The resource module of the original GSP resource
def log

The content length of the rendered output file.

The content type of the rendered output file.

The rendered output file.

The last modified of the rendered output file.

GspResourceMeta()

 
Method Summary
void beginPrepare(def grailsResourceProcessor)

Overridden method that gets called by grailsResourceProcessor when processing this resource (either on startup or when changed).
 

Property Detail

gsp

Resource gsp
The original GSP resource on the file system

Set when this resource meta is created by GspResourceMapper

The resource module of the original GSP resource

Set when this resource meta is created by GspResourceMapper

Integer renderedContentLength
The content length of the rendered output file.

Used in debug mode.

String renderedContentType
The content type of the rendered output file.

Used in debug mode.

The rendered output file.

Used in debug mode.

The last modified of the rendered output file.

Used in debug mode.

GspResourceMeta()

 
Method Detail

beginPrepare

@Override
void beginPrepare(def grailsResourceProcessor)
Overridden method that gets called by grailsResourceProcessor when processing this resource (either on startup or when changed).

This method triggers the GSP compilation.
